text: RuqtAqShAD RuqtadhA#mAq&gni-rga#ndhaqrvasta-syauSha#dhayO&Psaqrasaq UrjOq nAmaq sa iqdaM brahma# kShaqtraM pA#tuq tA iqdaM brahma# kShaqtraM pA$ntuq tasmaiq svAhAq tAByaqH svAhA# sa(gm)hiqtO viqSvasA#mAq sUryO# gandhaqrva-stasyaq marI#cayO&Psaqrasa# Aqyuva#H suShuqmnaH sUrya# raSmi-ScaqndramA# gandhaqrva-stasyaq nakSha#trANya-PsaqrasO# bEqkura#yOBuqjyuH su#paqrNO yaqj~jO ga#ndhaqrva-stasyaq dakShi#NA apsaqrasa# staqvAH praqjApa#ti-rviqSvaka#rmAq manO# - [  ]   19
